doc.field: harry reid has made the decision. now he says we can do immigration reform and we can do climate change. we can do both of them. when you talk to democrats privately, as dana was saying, they will tell you, there is virtually no chance, sanjay, none, that immigration reform is actually going to pass this year. i talked to a moderate house democrat today who said, look, the last thing in the world i want to be voting on in the house is immigration reform.
